ozpIwc.consensus.Bully Class

Extends BaseConsensus
Defined in: app/js/bus/transport/consensus/bully.js:6
Module: bus.consensus
Parent Module: bus

An implementation of the Bully Algorithm as a consensus module for the IWC. Acknowledge(OK) message is not used in current implementation, rather a victory message is sent out on an interval to notify other consensus modules whom the coordinator is.

The consensusId is a negative reference to the time at which the bully was created. This means the oldest bully module leads.

  • Index
  • Methods
  • Properties

Methods

cancelElection

()

Defined in app/js/bus/transport/consensus/bully.js:342

Cancels this modules participation in the current election.

gatherLogs

()

Defined in app/js/bus/transport/consensus/bully.js:42

Data passing functionality for those who use this module. Data passed into gatherLogs will be shared with other matching modules if this module is the coordinator.

onAckMessage

(
  • packet
)

Defined in app/js/bus/transport/consensus/bully.js:221

Handler function for receiving victory messages. If the sender out ranks this module, the module will act as a member of the module group and start a watchdog to start a new election if the coordinator goes silent.

Parameters:

  • packet Object

onAckMessage

(
  • packet
)

Defined in app/js/bus/transport/consensus/bully.js:198

Handler function for receiving acknowledge messages. If the acknowledge message is directed at this bully module, it will cancel its election as a higher ranking module exists.

Parameters:

  • packet Object

onAckMessage

(
  • packet
)

Defined in app/js/bus/transport/consensus/bully.js:249

Handler function for receiving query messages. If this module is the coordinator it will respond with a victory message to inform sender that this module is the coordinator.

Parameters:

  • packet Object

onBecomeCoordinator

()

Defined in app/js/bus/transport/consensus/bully.js:304

Handler function for when this module becomes coordinator of all active matching bully modules.

onCoordinatorTimeout

(
  • timeout
)

Defined in app/js/bus/transport/consensus/bully.js:289

Handler function for when no response was made by the coordinator and its watchdog times out.

Parameters:

  • timeout Object

onElectionMessage

(
  • packet
)

Defined in app/js/bus/transport/consensus/bully.js:172

Handler function for receiving election messages. If the message sender is of lower rank than this module, this module joins the election.

Parameters:

  • packet Object

restartCoordinatorTimeout

(
  • [timeout]
)

Defined in app/js/bus/transport/consensus/bully.js:271

Restarts the watchdog for which the coordinator must respond before ending otherwise this module will start an election.

Parameters:

  • [timeout] Number optional

routePacket

(
  • packetContext
)

Defined in app/js/bus/transport/consensus/bully.js:56

Routes packets for the bully module. Packets with the following actions are accepted:

  • election
  • acknowledge
  • query
  • victory

Parameters:

  • packetContext ozpIwc.TransportPacket

(

Defined in app/js/bus/transport/consensus/bully.js:114

Parameters:

sendElectionMessage

()

Defined in app/js/bus/transport/consensus/bully.js:99

Sends an election message to other Bully Modules to determine a coordinator.

sendQueryMessage

()

Defined in app/js/bus/transport/consensus/bully.js:152

Sends a query message to other bully modules. The Coordinator will hear this message and respond immediately with a victory message to inform Coordinator status.

sendVictoryMessage

()

Defined in app/js/bus/transport/consensus/bully.js:135

Sends a victory message to other bully modules informing them of this modules role as Coordinator.

(
  • [timeout]
)

Defined in app/js/bus/transport/consensus/bully.js:324

Makes this bully module start an election for the coordinator role.

Parameters:

  • [timeout] Number optional

Number

Defined in app/js/bus/transport/consensus/bully.js:28

Number

Defined in app/js/bus/transport/consensus/bully.js:35
